Keystrokes¶

a … z or 1 … 9¶

Fill in the grid with the corresponding letter or number.

.¶

Toggle a grid square to blank or back to black.

,¶

Temporarily flash the symmetric square and move to it.

Enter¶

Switch direction of travel in grid.

'¶

Highlight the current cell. This state will not be saved.

?¶

Toggle help panel.

Ctrl-Z or Meta-Z¶

Undo the tlast action. See Undoing and Redoing Changes

Backspace¶

Delete the character in the grid and continue along the direction of travel.

<arrow>¶

Move inside the grid according to the arrow’s direction.

Phil
